tours.name: The Forest Hiker
tours.summary: Breathtaking hike through the Canadian Banff National Park
tours.description: Experience the serenity of the Canadian wilderness with a guide who knows the way.

tours.name: The Sea Explorer
tours.summary: Sail through the beautiful islands of Phuket, Thailand
tours.description: Explore the crystal clear waters and exotic marine life with our experienced crew.

tours.name: The Snow Adventurer
tours.summary: Exciting snow adventure in the Swiss Alps
tours.description: Join us for an exhilarating snowboarding experience with breathtaking views.

tours.name: The Desert Wanderer
tours.summary: Experience the vastness of the Sahara Desert
tours.description: Take a guided tour through the Sahara Desert and experience the nomadic lifestyle.

tours.name: The City Lights
tours.summary: Explore the vibrant city life of New York City
tours.description: Discover the iconic landmarks and hidden gems of NYC with a local guide.
